website_summaries.verdict: This spacious, transparent backpack earns top marks for its tough material and large pockets. Despite a few minor issues, overall it has more to offer in terms of features and quality than others in its class.
pros: Owners rave about the PVC construction that is thicker and more durable than competitors
Roomy with numerous pockets including one on each side
cons: Mesh that is on several of the pockets is prone to tearing
Zippers have been reported to occasionally jam or break

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these so far. My daughter can only use this type of book bag for school. She is a high school student and carries four to five 1 inch and 1-1/2 inch binders in addition to other supplies she needs for school. Surprisingly the first one I purchased lasted all of her first year of high school and a few months into this year before I had to get her a new one. She uses it everyday. The size is very good and the materials are pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had this bag for less than 2 months and the shoulder strap ripped off the backpack. I don't know how to get a hold of the buyer so I'm not sure it I can exchange it for another one. I bought this bag because it says "heavy duty" but people I work with have the $10 bag and theirs are still working unlike this one. Not happy with this purchase at all and would go with a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Zipper busted after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this "heavy duty" backpack for my son at the beginning of this school year, hoping it would last the year. But it didn't, zipper already busted, as you can see from the picture. School started on August 27, 2018 and today is November 7, 2018, the backpack lasted approximately 2 months. I would not buy again, giving one star because the plastic is pretty heavy duty, even if the rest of the backpack was not.
customer_reviews.author: partyof7

customer_reviews.title: Large!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is so sturdy! I am very pleased with my purchase. I wanted something for when I traveled to our ranch and be able to find the things I used the most. It is just perfect for me. I am using it for all my essentials and my books, etc! I am very pleased with the thickness of the plastic used to form the body of the pack. The zippers are very strong and work well. I would recommend this bag for all.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Smith

customer_reviews.title: K-Cliffs brand backpack
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 different clear plastic of varying brands before this one. they all fell apart at the seems, literally. this one is made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Seb. R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bag
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack because my sons school required the clear backpack. We have rain sporadically so we couldn't use the mesh bag that was suggested. This bag held up for the last half of the year with my very rough 11yr old boy. This bag held all of his books and his lunch daily. The zippers work well and the side pocket is perfect for his water bottle. We will be using this bag again for the next school year it held up so well. It completely surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Large Back Pack
customer_reviews.text: The Super Heavy Duty Vinyl See Through back pack was ideal for the purpose that I ordered it. It is excellent for carrying as many items as I like. It can hold large heavy items without any damage or it has fulfilled my desires for it.
customer_reviews.author: P P L

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack for Prison service
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack to take into the prison system. Others have complained about the zippers on their backpacks breaking or wearing out - well, this is one tough backpack, and the zippers are substantial as well.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: It opens all the way to the bottom so easy to get big binders out and way bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack and Amazon Basic Clear backpack. If your child needs a big backpack, this is the one. It opens all the way to the bottom so easy to get big binders out and way bigger than amazon basic. It is also very durable. My son is not very careful with backpack but it is holding fine. Update: After 6 month, My daughter's two of clear backpacks broke so I just odered the 3rd backpack. My son is still using this backpack and the only tear is the fabric finishing part with mesh packet where he put his water bottle. The material is surly thick and durable. I'm very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently working in the warehouse of a major private shipper while I'm going to school. We get checked by security on our way out and I saw some people using clear bags. I did a lot of research and this one seemed like one to try. Six months in, I love it. It holds what I need and hasn't had any problems or issues. I'm extremely happy with it because it was a great price, does exactly what I needed it to do, and hasn't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lupin1375

customer_reviews.title: Best Clear Back Pack HANDS DOWN
customer_reviews.text: This is the first clear back pack I've purchased that actually holds up. It's phenomenal. This is probably the 4th clear back pack I've bought since they're mandated at the High Schools and Middle Schools in our district. It's taken a beating for 6 months now and is as good as new. All of the others didn't seem to last for over 2 months. This one even holds a 3 inch binder, multiple spirals, gym clothes & shoes, books and tons of loose paper without looking super large.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good backpack
customer_reviews.text: So got one in late Feb for one of my kids and then again mid-March for my other kid! And they both lasted through the end of the school year in June with no issues! So needless to say they’ll still be using them for the start of school in a month. The plastic is stiff-hard but my boys are actually OK with that! They like that the backpack has held on this whole time! They don't c/o of the backpacks being hot, nothing crazy that has melted or anything!
customer_reviews.author: pinkynbd

customer_reviews.title: The overall durability of the palstic is great. The mess pockets ripped after 1 month and ...
customer_reviews.text: So I use this bag daily for my cleaning company, The overall durability of the palstic is great. The mess pockets ripped after 1 month and we were only putting 1 water bottle on side and trash bags on the other. We were not overstuffing them. The other day I do not like is that there is no rear pocket like most book bags of this size, which would help us keep some of our things more separated and organized. For the Price I believe it worth it, Just reinforce the mess pockets with something on the inside like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mrz.Cleanerz.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, is roomier which is great my son can fit his large binder and pencil box and still have room for three more fat books. Great buy, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for the modern days!
customer_reviews.text: It is sad that many schools have to require clear backpacks in this time and age because of our poor gun control but these are great nonetheless. My son just started school last week with this backpack and so far it is great! It fits a lot and can withstand his textbooks. The plastic is thick and of great quality while being a comfortable fit. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. I didn’t realized that the thread was ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. I didn’t realized that the thread was already broken because it’s a clear plastic bag. It’s too bad I can’t return it anymore. Won’t buy this again. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag to organize your junk in the car
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff. I keep my emergency car junk in it, slung behind the passenger seat. Paper towel roll, sweat pants in case it suddenly gets cold. A spray bottle of Windex to clean a dirty windshield or the steering wheel after Jiffy Lube is done with my car. These are things which once rolled around my back seat. Now they are in a tidy see-through bag that does not touch the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Southgal

customer_reviews.title: High School Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for a HS teen- since a lot of HS require clear backpacks now. It's pretty sturdy for a plastic/vinyl bag but, saying that, it is what it is. It's going to rip eventually after carrying heavy books and binders. Go ahead and purchase the warranty like I did. This is our replacement after 6 months. No problem getting the replacement. Quick shipment. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Clear Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is by far the best I have found. I have rebought it every year as you can get a whole years use out of it. The straps don't break and the plastic is VERY durable. We tried quite a few in the first year our district went to this requirement. Took us awhile to find this one, but I now I recommend it to all my mommy friends. Hands down best one to buy!
customer_reviews.author: K Summerford

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty solid, and the size is great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace the clear backpack my daughter was issued by her high school. That one lasted one semester, hopefully this does a bit better. The dimensions are perfect for her - she can throw in her books and other school stuff and still have enough room for a sweater and her lunch. Construction seems solid and the plastic is about as thick as it could be while remaining flexible. Of course, her school-issued backpack seemed pretty solid too at first, so we'll see. If we get a year out of this, I'll consider it good value for the money. It did give off an unpleasant plastic odor for a day or two, but that's faded.
customer_reviews.author: Kamidanshir

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first responder, and our bags must be clear for our shifts in the facility. This bag lasted me right at about a year, and that's with me packing it full to it's gills every shift. 6 16oz bottle of water between the front zipper pouch and the side mesh pockets, lunch or dinner and snacks inside and many books including college textbooks thrown in. Well worth it, and I would repurchase over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: I’m very pleased with this purchase & feel like I got excellent value for my money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put hygiene products in when we travel. I chose clear so it would be easily identified after a long day of travel. It is sturdy & easily holds a small bath mat, 2 towels, 2 washcloths small blow dryer, along with shampoo, conditioner, soap, cosmetics, etc. It is heavy duty plastic with sturdy seams & multiple pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A Gray

customer_reviews.title: If you need a large, clear backpack this is top of the line (and I do not review items very often)!
customer_reviews.text: My son is required to bring a clear backpack to school. I love that it is extremely durable and large. It has many pockets for his needs. The one thing I did not like was that I had to replace it due to a large RIP near the top. That being said; I DO NOT think it is due to the quality of the backpack, rather the sheer weight and number of items he has to carry. It lasted 3/4 of the year and I would DEFINITELY purchase it again! Great product and I would highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen in GA

customer_reviews.title: She packs it pretty full and the backpack is sturdy enough to handle ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter goes to a school which requires the students to have a clear backpack. Her mother bought her one from the school and it started ripping apart in no time. My granddaughter told me other students were having the same problem. I bought her this backpack and we have not had one problem with it. She packs it pretty full and the backpack is sturdy enough to handle the load. I am very happy with it, and I highly recommend it to every one.
customer_reviews.author: George Higgins

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Only an idiot would use this as a serious outdoor pack, & had my school district not mandated clear backpacks only I would’ve never bought it. That being said it seems to be the best of the clear backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne M. Keeble

customer_reviews.title: Big enough (finally)
customer_reviews.text: With the number of books our middle-schooler carries around with them, it's hard to find a large enough backpack. This one does a reasonable job for our "I can't get my locker open", havta-carry-everything-from-class-to-class kid. I look forward to the days when a clear backpack is no longer a necessity, but until then, I'll keep buying this one as long as they make it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Great spacious clear bookbag
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my son who is a 5'1 ft 7th grader. Previously I had bought one from Walmart , but that one was to small and really didn't fit much so I bought this one after researching several options...and I have to say I have no regrets. This came on time and is the perfect size for carrying what he needs for school. It has been very durable so far no tearing or complaints just some scuff marks on certain parts but that's pretty normal .... would recommend buying this bag it's great quality, durable, and has plenty of space for items ( fits 2 inch zipper binder / trapper keeper ).
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: ... always smile when they see my bag - they love it! It's easy to see everything
customer_reviews.text: The security guards at my job always smile when they see my bag - they love it! It's easy to see everything, and unlike other plastic bags, this is extra thick, so it won't crack. I put mine in our refrigerator units, since I keep my drinks and lunch in it as well, and it has never shown any signs of wear and tear. Definitely worth the money; don't waste yours on cheaper bags; this one is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Liane Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clear bag for sports events. This worked out great. Very spacious. It held a blanket, hoodie, hats, gloves, etc. It was raining and snowing at our last outdoor game so I was happy knowing that my pack could sit on the ground and everything would stay dry. I like that it has outside pockets also. I had no problem getting into the game with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Delecia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, Great value
customer_reviews.text: Been using this clear backpack for about a month now. I use it to carry my lunch, drinks and other personal items related to my job. So far it has been very durable, having carried (2) 2 liter bottles of soda in it as well as many other items; without any rips or distress. The smaller zipper pouch keeps my small belongs such as pens, highlighter and change organized. As with any bags made of pvc/plastic construction, it is important not to cause unnecessary distress on the seams by overfilling, carrying too much weight, or outright abusing it. If you take care of it, it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryssman Family

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack to take to NASCAR Races!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these backpacks to take our gear to NASCAR Races, which many tracks require a clear backpack. Roomy enough for radios, extra sweatshirt or jacket, snacks, binoculars, you name it! Heavy duty construction and lots of pockets! Great value too! We chose the black trim, but a great selection of trim colors also available.
customer_reviews.author: Alyda LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My wife works in a place where clear backpacks or bags in general are required. Have had it for some time now and it has held up better than any we have ever purchased in the past. Good product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Butch Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Factory Workers Friend
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy duty. It stands up to heavy weight and excessive use. It goes from heat to below zero without cracking. Big enough for lunches , Thermoses and assorted masks. We used fabric paint to put name on.
customer_reviews.author: Snowkids

customer_reviews.title: It's still going
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for work it's perfect security can see everything they even said thank u for making they're job easier. I really wasn't sure how long it would last I've had a few clear vinyl bags n they all broke quickly so I wanted to wait b4 writing a review so far I've been using this bag 5 days a week for many months now n I'm pretty tough on it n pack it with all kinds of stuff n it's still going. Only the mesh pockets broke but everything else is great. I would definitely buy it again if I ever need another one
customer_reviews.author: Lollipop

customer_reviews.title: A heavy duty, durable and dependable backpack indeed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my freshman and junior high school kids last November 2018 and 3 months later, the backpacks still going strong and sturdy. I bought 3 other backpack brands before and none of those lasted this long. Hopefully they won't change or discontinue this backpack. Will definitely buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for a clear backpack.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE clear backpack to buy. These backpacks lasts my boys an entire school year and more. The vinyl is durable enough to handle rough boys who throw their backpacks around and fill it full of books, binders and clothes. It’s also a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Jones

customer_reviews.title: You can take this into a prison
customer_reviews.text: I volunteered with a prison ministry before Covid. This backpack meets the standard of the prison I visited. Everything fits in nicely. It's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MDY

customer_reviews.title: Durable backpack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son for the current school year, and it has held up very well so far. He is in high school and has to carry alot of books and other items. The backpack has plenty of room for all of it. I would definitely purchase again and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tee Win

customer_reviews.title: Great for security conscious races.
customer_reviews.text: In the post Boston Marathon bombing era, most race organizers will be requiring clear baggage for the participants. This bag is big enough to haul everything you'll need to an event (including mud runs and triathlons). The straps are adequate, and the bag feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Van Allen

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, perfect for work and padded straps are great for tired shoulders. I've used it for a month with no problems. Love the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity21

customer_reviews.title: Pocket Netting Ripping Out, Less Than 2 Months Use
customer_reviews.text: So we've had this for less then 2 months now, and the netting on one of the side pouches is already ripping out. Otherwise there haven't been any problems, but given how short a time we've had this, I consider that to be a more significant quality control issue. It speaks poorly to the overall durability of this product, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: For Son's high school
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th type I tried, and it seems to be the best and most durable. All others, military or not, got torn up in a couple of months of teenager's use. This one is still going. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty bag. I work corrections and need it for my stuff I take in and out it's a well built bag
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bag
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying clear backpacks. They don't last, always replacing....until now. I love this backpack. Brought it to me our 16 yr old's school requirements. Spent more on it than we usually do. This bag is worth it. The plastic is more durable. We have had it for several months and no complaints. We would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JennieHobbs

customer_reviews.title: Super Durable
customer_reviews.text: I received this on September 26, so the first clear backpack that I ordered for my teenager lasted about one month into the school year. It is February 8 and this backpack is still going strong. Speaks for itself, don't ya think?
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Durable and deal for the size
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my crappy work issued bag, this hasn't fallen apart compared to my work one which got wrecked in the first hour. All my coworkers are buying this.
customer_reviews.author: It fits I sits

customer_reviews.title: Does not meet Stadium standards!
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as a stadium approved bag. It does not meet any of the standards. Do not buy in mind to use for facilities that require clear bags.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have bought a second one of these backpacks as the first one finally gave out after a year. My husband needs a clear backpack for work and this backpack has been good to him. We hope the 2nd will last longer but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's not required yet, we use it for MLB baseball games. The stadium security staff gives us an easier time because it helps them in their job. Happy, happy, happy. The quality is excellent and I expect it'll last for a few seasons at least.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: The sewing done on the zipper is shoddy at best. Large gaps between the next thread entry
customer_reviews.text: This item is ok for the money. The zipper on the larger compartment is already pulling apart from the body of the bag. The sewing done on the zipper is shoddy at best. Large gaps between the next thread entry. Could have been put together better. Kind of disappointed. But it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Strong. Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong back pack. I use this to hold my lunch and tablet with external battery to work at the airport. TSA prefers a see through container for us so it's quicker to check out. I bought another for my father it's so good. I can see this holding up with fair use. If you break this i would guess you put way to much weight into it and if this the case you are looking for back pain issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dariel.C

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: I work in corrections and use this backpack 5 days a week. It’s hard to find a good, durable, clear backpack. This one has been great so far. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Poor Materials Quality
customer_reviews.text: After approximately one year, one of the shoulder straps has detached from the backpack. I expected more durability from an item that is marketed as "heavy duty". What is particularly galling is that I cannot find any contact information for either the manufacturer nor the seller to inquire about product warranty. If you choose to purchase this item, don't expect to get any post-sales support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and solid bag
customer_reviews.text: Very thick vinyl, much better than my company's furnished bag which is destroyed after 4 months use. This should last quite a lot longer as the vinyl is much thicker. The zippers are solid and smooth also, very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: nothingness

customer_reviews.title: The best clear backpack on the market
customer_reviews.text: The best clear backpack on the market . First I don't want to order because the price is a little too much but I took the chance after read the detail . I use this for work and I live it the zipper go all the way down on both side and the side pockets are great. Worth every Penney
customer_reviews.author: pattama silapachai

customer_reviews.title: Clear Backpack
customer_reviews.text: When we 1st received this we immediately began inspecting it. We can say we are happy with this purchase because it has amazing quality, stitching, and was worth the economical price.
customer_reviews.author: Childs

customer_reviews.title: You can depend on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was very big enough to put my stuff in. I like that it was clear enough to see everything in, Because it is the type of thing I have to use for work so people can see what's in my backpack and know that I'm not trying to steal anything. I also like the added bonus that if it rains all of my stuff will remain dry, including my phone and laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Medford Charles Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Mesh pocket broke
customer_reviews.text: The plastic seems durable but the mesh pocket inside broke in two weeks. The bag overall is still intact after a few months. I’ve seen a lot of broken backpacks at my school. Their backpacks break every few weeks while mine is still perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Phu

customer_reviews.title: Big backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice big backpack! This is our second order because we liked this product so much. First one was for my high schooler and we were both impressed with quality and size so bought a second for my Middle schooler.
customer_reviews.author: Jfree

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: New this year for a 10 year old, it has taken a beating in just the first weeks of school looks to be in it for the haul!
customer_reviews.author: tari78

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I was very concerned about plastic backpacks and its durability. But I was nicely surprised that her backpack lasted all year long and she was carrying lots of books to school. The pockets on the sides (not plastic) ripped after a while but the structure of the backpack remained the same. I reorder another one for this year and truly recommend to everyone. Hopefully, you will be nicely surprised as well.
customer_reviews.author: CIR

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Customer here!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd backpack that I have purchased from this company! The first was a test to see how durable it was. Needless to say, this is an excellent and very durable backpack. I highly recommend this product, especially if your student has alot of items to carry around all day.
customer_reviews.author: bb4me

customer_reviews.title: Was happy with the product but it has no longevity.
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up so well, with everyday use the stitching in the bottom broke out within about 2 months. Sticking around the zipper also pulled apart.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Merthe

customer_reviews.title: Roomy clear backpack - as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Quality backpack; sturdy shoulder straps; I agree with most of the other reviews that it's a good buy for the $$$
customer_reviews.author: D. Green

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My middle schooler says it’s sturdier and better made than the last clear backpack she had.
customer_reviews.author: Trans Am Lover

customer_reviews.title: Thought I made a good purchase but am disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Thought I made a good purchase but am disappointed in the quality. My daughter has only been using this backpack for school for 2 weeks and the strap that was sewn in at the bottom is already coming out. Hope it at least will hold for few months until I find another one. My son says the bottom seam pokes him in the back while he's wearing it. Would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Woods

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was just what we needed to carry items into the stadium. I have only needed it once so cannot speak on the longevity of its use. But it served the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JLLo

customer_reviews.title: Great value and super durable
customer_reviews.text: My girls go through so many backstage and this one has stood the durability test. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Sack

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack and hoping my daughter could make it thru middle school and didn’t even last 5 months! We put duck tape on it to hold together till end of school year! Look at pics!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cardey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a prison and have to use clear items. I have bought other products that didn’t last very long but this product is very well put together and is huge...very highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Marley

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Not durable , not heavy duty . I bought 2 and my son used both within 6 months and they broke apart . I need to buy the 3rd one now and definitely will not buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We’re stuck with clear backpacks. This one is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy duty.....but
customer_reviews.text: This is a really heavy duty backpack, but the mesh on the sides have ripped on both sides! I will definitely buy it again. I just wish it didn’t rip on the sides where I keep my drinks for work. Return policy ended too quick, I feel I just purchased this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lil T

customer_reviews.title: Happy with size but durability is TBD
customer_reviews.text: It’s an adult size which is good. It’s not very durable but it will do for now. It’s my son’s third bag for the year and he’s very careful with the way he handles them. He’s happy with the size and the larger water bottle sleeves. Actual durability is TBD.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: needed clear bag
customer_reviews.text: I need a clear bag this one small after six months it started to crack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable for the price
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is our second one, the 1st lasted for about a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: debilov1

customer_reviews.title: It does not stand the test of time
customer_reviews.text: High school students go through most of these clear type backpacks in about 6 to 8 months. That is because they go through a lot of rough treatment on a daily basis. Unfortunately, this backpack is only 3 months old and has already failed to stand up to the test. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PDD

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is going on 2 Years old still in good condition and used dauly
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: 7 months and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I work two jobs and I live out of this backpack when I'm not at home, I keep it loaded to the brim with spare clothes and portable chargers,notebooks,vape juice...etc I've had it going on 7 months and it's still good as the day I got it! No Holes, straps are still in tact, and no sign of wearing out any time soon! Ideal bag if you work in an arena like I do where we have to have a clear bag for security protocol!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kid puts this backpack through a workout every school year and it lasts! For a plastic backpack, it is impressive. I have purchased it multiple times. One usually lasts an entire school year plus some of the next year.
customer_reviews.author: kimminan82

customer_reviews.title: backpack
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great for work at state hospital. Clear for safety. I will probably get a second in the future
customer_reviews.author: Debi Blake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag extensively. The bag is very big allowing me to put my lunch, several water bottles, and anything I need for work in it without any issues. The threading is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Billy G.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: seems to hold up pretty well. shoulder straps are a little awkward and i had to smooth out the zipper before use but it has held up well for everyday school use.
customer_reviews.author: marblemaniac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome back pack!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her backpack, very sturdy and heavy duty....as she has to carry a lot of books. I am very satisfied with my purchase! :)
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest but is large and holds a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Had to have this for work. After 3 months or so of daily use (I dont carry a lot of weight in it, just lunch, tissues, pens, etc) it began to lose shape and form holes at the new creases. Side mesh pocket trim lasted 2 weeks before I had to restitch.
customer_reviews.author: ms melanie

customer_reviews.title: Same size as regular backpack
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and large enough to hold my stuff. Haven’t used yet so not sure about durability or quality but looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty and high quality. Way better than the one I bought at Walmart for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Quinones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: a really good backpack
customer_reviews.text: this is a good size and heavy duty backpack, my teen autistic son has gone through 2 backpacks so far since August, and this one has been holding up really well, he carries all kinds of stuff and nothing has torn it yet. Hopefully it will make it through June.
customer_reviews.author: A .Y. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: A+++ backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son's school went to clear backpack requirements after a very large episode with Brian Kil (you can do a search on the internet). Most plastic material like this is not going to hold long but this backpack has done an A++++ job. He likes it, it is a nice size for a sophomore in high school, it has held up well in the year that we have had it and are nowhere near in need of replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Absher

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the bag today. Seems sturdy enough. Thicker material than others I've seen. Perfect for working in corrections. Time will only tell on how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: CKirch73

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird but solid backpack
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little pricey, but overall would recommend for any event that requires clear bags. The straps are comfortable and it's a perfect size to fit a blanket plus whatever you need. Fair warning: strong smell of plastic
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Zippers completely open the main section making loading/unloading easy.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for all my middle school childs books & lunch box! Material seems strong and durable. Zippers completely open the main section making loading/unloading easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I work at an Amuesment Park where we have to use clear bags and always am packing a ton of things for no reason so this bag is perfect for that. But it recently broke on the bottom where the stitching is and now I need a new bag. I’m disappointed because I spent $25 on this and now I have to find another bag that hopefully won’t break on me after only using it for around 3-4 months
customer_reviews.author: Halia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty plastic. Lots of room. Sturdy. I've even spilled liquid in the bottom of it, and the seams allowed for the liquid to drain out. I work in a place that is really hard on my gear, and this has stood up to the abuse so far.
customer_reviews.author: JDenny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, roomy backpack that is also clear!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used my clear backpack yet but it seems quite durable AND roomy! I carry medical supplies and sometimes I have to go to venues where my bag has to be clear. I had bought another one previously (different company) and it did not hold up well. This one is much more sturdier!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school.
customer_reviews.text: Bag seems to be sturdier that ones we have purchased in the past. Hoping it holds up well for the rest of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wolbach

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for a clear backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a prison, so need a clear backpack to bring personal items in for my shift. I've been buying this backpack for a number of years. I reinforce the critical stress points with duct tape before using it and get 12-15 months of heavy use out of each backpack. After trying several others over the years, I've kept coming back to this one as the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome material
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and very durable. My daughter has been using this same backpack for 7 months and it is still holding up and many of her friends have already had to replace their school bag.
customer_reviews.author: Harps2012

customer_reviews.title: Good looking backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is my second clear backpack, and this one looks to be constructed better than the last one. I use this for carrying books and teaching materials into a prison. I like the reinforced strap across the back for more strength in holding the shoulder straps. I also like the side pockets for holding water bottles. If this lasts longer than two years, it will have surpassed my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Save A Buck

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed it has survived!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes Batman! My son destroys almost everything he gets his hands on. I was sure that a plastic backpack would be found in shreds. WRONG! This backpack has survived a full school year. I honestly can't say that about any cloth ones! It's freakin' witchcraft I tell ya!!
customer_reviews.author: Mia P.

product_meta.title: Heavy Duty Clear Backpack See Through PVC Stadium Security Transparent Workbag | Black
product_meta.description: Color:Clear/BlackSuper heavy duty See-Through Backpack. Material: Clear PVC Dimension: 17"x13.5"x7" Heavy duty zipper. Sturdy mesh pocket on both sides. Dual zipper on both main compartment & front pocket. Padded and adjustable shoulder straps.
feature_bullets: THICK CLEAR BACKPACKS - 55% Thicker than any competing brand, Clear design allows easy travel and visibility of items for security checkpoints and at schools.

COMFORTABLE DOUBLE PADDED STRAPS - Our S-Curve Ergonomic Design hugs your body for all day comfort. The luxurious Double Layers and Smooth Nylon will not scratch your skin like other cheap and stiff single padded straps.
EASY TO CLEAN - This transparent bag is made of waterproof material, making it easy to wipe away dirt and grime. It also protects your belongings from rain and other spills.
STADIUM APPROVED - Transparency of the bag meets security checkpoint requirements at stadium games such as soccer, football, tennis, and golf tournaments.
Super Spacious and plenty of room for books and other belongings.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars881 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
